SongPop’s 5th Anniversary is almost here! The game has never been better and we aren’t slowing down one bit.

Our 2.7 update brings major changes to the way playlists work and big improvements to VIP!

1. VIP users can now pick between 5 playlists (including most recent and starred) and compare masteries with their opponents
2. Ability to “Star" playlists for quick access
3. We are switching from a weekly batch of new playlists to a new playlist every day including themed days of the week! (starting in June)
4. Introducing “Playlist Re-Release”! We will begin updating old popular playlists and re-releasing them one at a time. You can opt-in to restart the playlists, take part in the mastery race, and win rewards (will cost 5 power ups, starting in June)
5. Be more plugged in and customize your experience more than ever! Receive a notification the moment we release a playlist that matches your musical taste (requires app notifications to be turned on)
6. Adding support for new Grand Winner Parties (starting in June, stay tuned for more info!)

Thank you to all of our SongPop family for supporting us on this soon-to-be 5 year musical journey!

Who doesn’t like chocolate ? Our Easter update is here with a few surprises and sweet fixes. Let us know if you find one of our Easter eggs!

A major SongPop update arrives with the new season! Most of our previous updates went up to iOS 10…these go to 11. We’re excited to partner with Apple Music to bring full length tracks right to your SongPop app! We’re also rolling out a brand new pack of custom SongPop stickers for all of your musical iMessage needs.

To top it all off we also fixed some minor bugs to make the game run even better during the summer. Best of all? Our t-shirt store opened up so you can stay cool in some comfy tee's. Come and celebrate with us!

Melody and her friends haven’t had the time to relax and enjoy the summer because they have been working on making SongPop 2 even better! We cleaned up the game to make it run better and smoother than ever before. These are some of the things we fixed:
- Profile page now displays the accurate weekly score you earned
- Challenge notifications not working or triggering without tapping them

As the nights become cooler and you swap out your summer clothes for something warmer, we did the same with our new Fall theme. This update changes the Daily Bonus for select players once they install the new version of the app. If you are part of the rollout you will notice that the Daily Bonus screen has slightly changed the next time you collect your daily reward. We also removed some features such as Facebook ticket gifting to improve performance and make room for new things within the app.

Spring is coming to SongPop

No matter what you celebrate this holiday season, Melody and her friends have a few gifts and surprises for you in the new 2.12 update. We decked the halls and made the season more jolly with our new and improved Daily Bonus! You can now get endless tickets or double your coins earned for a limited time from the daily bonus once you activate them, a gift that is all year long and would even make a grinch smile. Just like letters to Santa Claus, we want to make sure everything's delivered right on time. We updated our push notifications so you can choose what you want to see and have all it nicely displayed on your screen.

For players with the most recent iOS devices that support haptic feedback, don’t worry you’re not on the naughty list! We have the game tell you every time you get an answer right (or wrong) with a nice little shake after each question. A little gift from us to you!

You'll Gobble up our new Thanksgiving icon and splash screen just in time for our Thanksgiving event at the end of November! Feast your eyes on improved performance on the latest phones and have a "gourd time" playing some SongPop 2!

Put on your snow boots and party hats, as our Winter update brings some presents to keep you busy this winter (sorry no cocoa)! Bundle up under the sheets and enjoy our Winter themed splash screen without having to go outside! We "ice-olated" and fixed some naughty bugs that would make the Grinch blush and updated our Grand Winner Party Global leaderboards to make it easier to see the top 3 players. So now you'll be able to see if a prize or winter is coming your way!

Let's enjoy the last weeks of Winter with the Winter theme and icon, no snowplowing will be required! Besides keeping it cool, we are always improving the performance and stability of the app. Make sure to stay tuned as we will be introducing more parties and badges down the road to keep you busy and having fun all Winter long.

We have some tricks and some sweet treats for our players this Halloween. Expect a new Halloween splash screen and app icon for some Halloween fun! We also removed some of the scary bugs that Melody heard about so the game will run smoother than before.

No matter what you celebrate this holiday season, Melody and her friends have a few gifts and surprises for you in the new 2.12 update. We decked the halls and made the season more jolly with our new and improved Daily Bonus! You can now get endless tickets or double your coins earned for a limited time from the daily bonus once you activate them, a gift that is all year long and would even make a grinch smile. Just like letters to Santa Claus, we want to make sure everything's delivered right on time. We updated our push notifications so you can choose what you want to see and have all it nicely displayed on your screen.

For players with the most recent iOS devices that support haptic feedback, don’t worry you’re not on the naughty list! We have the game tell you every time you get an answer right (or wrong) with a nice little shake after each question. A little gift from us to you!

You'll Gobble up our new Thanksgiving icon and splash screen just in time for our Thanksgiving event at the end of November! Feast your eyes on improved performance on the latest phones and have a "gourd time" playing some SongPop 2!

Put on your snow boots and party hats, as our Winter update brings some presents to keep you busy this winter (sorry no cocoa)! Bundle up under the sheets and enjoy our Winter themed splash screen without having to go outside! We "ice-olated" and fixed some naughty bugs that would make the Grinch blush and updated our Grand Winner Party Global leaderboards to make it easier to see the top 3 players. So now you'll be able to see if a prize or winter is coming your way!

Let's enjoy the last weeks of Winter with the Winter theme and icon, no snowplowing will be required! Besides keeping it cool, we are always improving the performance and stability of the app. Make sure to stay tuned as we will be introducing more parties and badges down the road to keep you busy and having fun all Winter long.
